title: No Effects Whatsoever
report: I've tried six times the recommended dosage of 'dream herb' on the bottle, with no noticeable effects whatsoever (I took it before going to sleep). It's still a great company according to many people whose messages I've read, though......I guess it's a matter of knowing which items to get. Their San Pedro is probably worth trying.

erowid.citation: DSprouse. "No Effects Whatsoever: experience with Calea zacatechichi (ID 2266)". Erowid.org. Jun 30, 2000. erowid.org/exp/2266
